delay_helper: Sets a delay (in minutes) to skip inactivity checks after a device has been turned on manually
m_descr:
This module will automatically turn off selected devices (switches, dimmers) after no movement or activity has been detected for a defined period.
Check github.com/maros/Zway-AutoOffInactive for detailed documentation.
sensors_helper: Multiple binary sensors (ie. movement sensors) that indicate activity
switch_helper: Multiple switches that should be turned off after given inactivity period
timeout_helper: Timeout period in minutes. Will turn off all devices n-minutes after the last activity was reported from the sensors
